â€¢Kabbalistic Interpretation: This echoes the idea of concealment within revelationâ€”similar to Kabbalistic principles where hidden divine truths are only revealed to the deserving. Secrets maintained under SC protection suggest that some truths remain concealed to preserve order.
â€¢Eschatology: This might correspond to apocalyptic revelations where only in due time are certain truths unveiled, protecting the populace from information potentially too destabilizing to handle without spiritual preparation.
